body_html:
I couldn't replicate this on an Ubuntu docker container.

I also couldn't replicate this on an Arch linux docker container, with the same versions as yours:

$ docker run -it base/archlinux bash
>$ pacman -Syy                                                                                                               
>$ pacman -S python3                                                                                                                                                                                                          
>$ pacman -S python-pip
>$ pip install tensorflow                                                                                                                                                                                                    
>$ python3.6
Python 3.6.4 (default, Jan  5 2018, 02:35:40)                                                                                    
[GCC 7.2.1 20171224] on linux                                                                                                    
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.                                                           
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>>

It looks like this might be local, or a GPU-specific issue. Can you replicate this in Docker (ideally nvidia-docker) for us?

body:
I couldn't replicate this on an Ubuntu docker container.

I also couldn't replicate this on an Arch linux docker container, with the same versions as yours:

```bash
$ docker run -it base/archlinux bash
>$ pacman -Syy                                                                                                               
>$ pacman -S python3                                                                                                                                                                                                          
>$ pacman -S python-pip
>$ pip install tensorflow                                                                                                                                                                                                    
>$ python3.6
Python 3.6.4 (default, Jan  5 2018, 02:35:40)                                                                                    
[GCC 7.2.1 20171224] on linux                                                                                                    
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.                                                           
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>>
```

It looks like this might be local, or a GPU-specific issue. Can you replicate this in Docker (ideally nvidia-docker) for us?
